DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Each annotation text occurrence within the set of contents referenced by the structured dimension callout shall have a name of either of the following: 'dimension value', 'tolerance value', 'unit text', 'prefix text', or 'suffix text'.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY ( Ato <* QUERY ( Con <* SELF.contents | ( 'IFCPRESENTATIONDEFINITIONRESOURCE.IFCANNOTATIONTEXTOCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(Con)) ) | (NOT (Ato.Name IN ['dimension value', 'tolerance value','unit text','prefix text','suffix text'])))) = 0
